title: Learning Penchak Silat Art Movements: Integrated Problem-Based Flipped Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Language arts curriculum integrated with Penchak Silat artistic movement learning, applied to digital device-based educational environments for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform 50 basic empty-hand techniques of pencak silat with over 80% accuracy
Learners can identify motion errors and create correction plans using biomechanical analysis tools
Through problem-solving scenarios, learners produce project outcomes demonstrating artistic expression strategies for pencak silat movements

resources: Motion Analysis Video Based on Kinovea Application
Android App Based on RAD Studio 10.3 Development Tool

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
